name: Downstairs
description:
SUBJECT
James, a former FBI agent, is on the hunt for his best friend Mary, during which some very bad things happen to him, he gets injured, his eyes go black, he loses consciousness. We don't know if our main character, who witnesses many different events like this, will be able to achieve his goal, find Mary or solve the events, it's up to you, good games in advance.

CHARACTERS IN THE GAME
-James
-Marry
-Unknown







Mary is James's girlfriend, we can be sure that he will do whatever he can for Mary, but will you be able to do it? In our game, there are many puzzles such as opening locked doors, finding passwords, solving passwords, of course, of course, your flashlight turns on and off by itself from time to time because our flashlight is faulty.The most frightening thing in the game will be the ambient sounds, even if there is really no "jumpscare" in any way, the environment you find will make you nervous enough.Dark corridors, hidden passwords, different symbols and so on.





THIS GAME IS COMPLETELY CODED AND DESIGNED BY 1 PERSON PLEASE MAKE YOUR EVALUATIONS ACCORDINGLY !
